idea:
We are Aashadhi Ventures, India's 1st & only Social Startup started by like-minded strangers online on social media platform of "Quora Marathi".


On this social enterpreneurship platform of Aashadhi Ventures, we are raising social capital, doing some social experiments, trying some social innovations and building sustainable and profit oriented model of social experience.


OUR VALUES

Startups are an opportunity to explore one's true abilities instead of just merely running after profits. Our values lie in aligning one's business goals with their passion.


OBJECTIVES

To build an accessible Open Entrepreneurship platform for our passionate individuals.


VISION

To utilise the time & resources in the execution of rewarding projects while maintaining social consciousness.


SOCIAL VISION

A group of like-minded committed individuals can build a promising social solution to address issues like ...

● Affordable Healthy Food

● Fair Trade for Growers

● Digital Education For Every Kid

We firmly believe that social rewards can ensure quality and fair trade along with building a sustainable and resilient model of social economics.
name: AASHADHI VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Digital Diagnostics, POCT, Infection Prevention, Visualization, & Energy, Govt. Projects
name: SYLIS TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea:
One Stop source for a total solution to capture and manage all clinical trial information across all phase, therapeutic areas, magnitude or complexity of the studies.

An easy to use and cost-effective integrated solution that delivers data solutions on-demand for pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical device companies, Contract Research Organizations and Data Management companies.

VDigi-Suiteis a complete package which provides a range of integrated modules in one platform, enabling the continuous flow of data to improve data quality which are compliant with21 CFR Part 11, HIPPA and GDPR requirements. These modules include EDC, Safety Database, eTMF, IWRS/ drug management, e-PRO , e-Diary and CTMS.
name: VDIGIDATA SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Who are we?

Finzard is designed to rescue you from your overwhelming personal financial management experience. Finzard simplifies personal finance and money management with a goal-based, holistic & innovative technological approach that is effortless and efficient alike. You can plan a big goal like buying a home or a small goal like buying your favorite gadget with Finzard. Our effortless user experience is sure to keep you ahead in the financial management game!

Finzard provides a one-stop solution for visualizing all your financial investments and making you a better investor by empowering you with our personalized recommendations.

We are your automated Financial Planner. Build and grow your wealth.

Hit the ground running with features like-

Consolidate your Finances

1.Connect with your Banks

2.Connect with Brokerages like Zerodha for your stocks investment

3.Upload Mutual Fund CAS statements by CDSL, CAMS, KARVY

4.Manually add any type of Investments

Track your Finances

1.Real-time Mutual Fund Tracking with the latest NAV

2.Investments Tracking with Inflation adjustment

3.Track your Income from different sources

4.Track your Expenses from different sources

Simplified Goal Tracking

Plan your Finances

1.Financial Calculators

2.Real Estate Planning

3.Tax Planning

4.Insurance Planning

5.Budget Planning

6.Financial Planning for big purchases like Home, Education, Weddings, 7.Vacations, and much more

8.Rainy Day Fund and Medical Emergency Planning

9.Planning for a secure and comfortable future

Manage your Finances

1.Wealth Management

2.Cash Flow Management

3.Manage your Financial Risks across Investments

4.Manage Financial Goals

5.Smart Money Management

6.Personalized Financial Recommendations

Unlock Financial Wizardry to grow your wealth. Join for a Free Plan now! Just simply create your goals to get hassle-free insights into your financial life.

Security?

-We take user data privacy very seriously and are aware of the importance of maintaining it.

-To ease some of those concerns, we have partnered with Amazon Web services (AWS) to host our app and the Database, which provides top of the line data security and peace of mind

- Strict data security policies & encryption:

Managing finance is like waving a wand and enjoying Wizardry with us! You will be able to track your investments, cash flow, and goals with an effectively curated plan for you and your financial dreams.
name: FINGO APP PRIVATE LIMITED

name: VISFUN ACADEMY PVT LTD

idea:
Start-up offering last mile connectivity for Techno-Infra Services across the States of Maharashtra and Goa (in the initial phase) by partnering with OEMs, System Integrators, Authorized Support Providers etc. These organizations, typically face challenges in providing project-based short-term services as per SLAs in a cost-effective manner.


These organizations are not keen on having manpower on their rolls for such project based services. They would also like to deal with one entity as compared to multiple vendors across the state.


Opportunities – Installations for End-User Computing (Desktops / Laptops, Printers, Scanners etc.) Switch / Router Installations, OS Migration, Data Migration, IP Migration, Break-down calls – Institutional as well as Retail segments, staffing, Physical Asset Verification, Preventive Maintenance etc. May be expanded to include CCTV and other Technology Infrastructure products


Build pan-Maharashtra/Goa teams and leverage manpower at remote locations for range of services
name: Ajira TechnoInfra Services Pvt. Ltd.

idea: INTERNET SERVICE IN MAHARSHTRA  MUMBAI DHARAVI  DHARAVI
name: JS Enterprises

idea:
The Science & Technology Ventures Limited (S&T) has been constituted to address the various initiatives & aspects of clean development mechanism to encounter the most vital subject of the day that is global warming. The S&T is formed by the people who are deeply concerned with the subject matter and strongly believe that they should not handover the earth to the next generation with problems as it is a loan to them from that generation.

We at S&T is one of the Most Trusted Name in the field of Installation of CNG Kit in all make and Model of the Car. We Install Conventional and Sequential CNG Kit in Car and Diesel Heavy vehicle CNG Conversion. We are Government Approved CNG Kit Fitment Centre of All Types of Car & heavy vehicles. We have successfully installed over thousands of CNG Kits in Small Cars, Middle Segment Cars and Diesel Heavy vehicle CNG conversion. We have over 15 years of experience of installing CNG Conversion Kit in Car.

S&T is in Collaboration with all Italian, Argentina and Indian Manufacture of CNG Conversion Kits and Their Components. We install Original and Government Approved Italian, Argentine and Indian Made CNG Kits as per Choice of Customers.

Installation of CNG Conversion Kits at S&T is Carried out by Trained and ITI Mechanics. We have different team to install Conventional and Sequential CNG Kits in Car.
name: SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY VENTURES LIMITED
